results.content:
Incomplete: not good value

The course was good and I am glad I did it. However, the course is rather incomplete. There wasn't a tutorial on react router to make the menu links work, nor did it teach how to filter meal items. Also, the teacher did not include the link to the api in the course material section which is odd. He should have included it as a link to copy and paste to speed things up. 

For the money, this course is not worth it! For the same price you can purchase others with much more content included, and even on YouTube there are better. I am disappointed by the lack of features such as filtering menu items and react router. If these were implemented I would of given 5 stars, but sadly I can only give 2 stars. 

I was looking to see this included as I was looking for a quick and short course like this. I can only hope these are added soon as I do not think they would take long to do. This will add better value to the student who is wishing to take this course and I would of given 5 stars if such features were implemented.

response.content:
Thanks for your feedback:)
I have designed this course espicially for beginners who doesn't even know what is React.As I mentioned in the course title this is just a crash course for beginners with a hands-on project.So could not give all the features of React in just 2Hours.But i have given all the topics which are usefull for complete beginners.I've completly agree with your review and I will try add the addition topics soon.
Thanks
Happy Coding:)
